title: Rajnath Singh asks BRO to tap tech, cites Chinese infra boost along LAC - Hindustan Times
content: Rajnath Singh asks BRO to tap tech, cites Chinese infra boost along LAC  Hindustan Times
description: The government had increased the capital budget of BRO by 40% to ₹3,500 crore in 2022-23, reflecting the Centre’s commitment to the country’s security and development of border areas, he said.
